targets.rawSql:
SELECT project.title 
FROM project 
WHERE project.title in ($v_programmalijn)
SELECT description FROM project WHERE title IN ($v_programmalijn )

--SELECT name FROM milestone WHERE milestone_id=1 and name in ($v_subdoelen)
SELECT DISTINCT milestone.name FROM milestone, leeftijdsfase, project WHERE milestone.name in ($v_subdoel) 
and leeftijdsfase.name in ($v_leeftijdsfase) and project.title in ($v_programmalijn) and milestone_id= 1

--SELECT name FROM streven WHERE streven_id= 1 --and name IN ($v_subdoelen)
--SELECT DISTINCT streven.name FROM streven, milestone 
--WHERE milestone.name IN ($v_subdoel) and streven_id= 1
SELECT DISTINCT streven.name 
FROM streven
JOIN milestone_streven ON streven.streven_id = milestone_streven.streven_id
JOIN milestone ON milestone.milestone_id = milestone_streven.milestone_id
WHERE streven.streven_id = 1 AND milestone.name IN ($v_subdoel)

--SELECT target_kerkrade, target_zuidlimburg FROM ervarengezondheid, milestone WHERE ervarengezondheid_id= 1
--SELECT DISTINCT target_kerkrade, target_zuidlimburg FROM ervarengezondheid, milestone 
--WHERE name IN ($v_subdoel) and ervarengezondheid_id= 1 
SELECT DISTINCT target_kerkrade, target_zuidlimburg
FROM ervarengezondheid
JOIN milestone_ervarengezondheid ON ervarengezondheid.ervarengezondheid_id = milestone_ervarengezondheid.ervarengezondheid_id
JOIN milestone ON milestone.milestone_id = milestone_ervarengezondheid.milestone_id
WHERE ervarengezondheid.ervarengezondheid_id = 1 AND milestone.name IN ($v_subdoel);

--SELECT DISTINCT 'Wijk' AS label, wijk.name FROM wijk, milestone 
--WHERE wijk.name IN ('Haanrade', 'Gracht') and wijk.name IN ($v_wijken) and milestone.name IN ($v_subdoel)
SELECT DISTINCT 'Wijk' AS label, wijk.name
FROM wijk
JOIN milestone_wijk ON wijk.wijk_id = milestone_wijk.wijk_id
JOIN milestone ON milestone.milestone_id = milestone_wijk.milestone_id
WHERE wijk.name IN ('Haanrade', 'Gracht') AND wijk.name IN ($v_wijken) AND milestone.name IN ($v_subdoel);

--SELECT title FROM programma WHERE programma_id= 1 
--title IN ('Diverse programmas vitaal ouder worden', 'Geboorteflex', 'Knooppunt')
SELECT DISTINCT programma.title
FROM programma
JOIN milestone_programma ON programma.programma_id = milestone_programma.programma_id
JOIN milestone ON milestone_programma.milestone_id = milestone.milestone_id
WHERE programma.programma_id= 1 AND milestone.name IN ($v_subdoel);
SELECT name FROM milestone WHERE milestone_id=2 and name in ($v_subdoel)

--SELECT name FROM streven WHERE streven_id= 2
--SELECT DISTINCT streven.name FROM streven, milestone 
--WHERE milestone.name IN ($v_subdoel) and streven_id= 2
SELECT DISTINCT streven.name 
FROM streven
JOIN milestone_streven ON streven.streven_id = milestone_streven.streven_id
JOIN milestone ON milestone.milestone_id = milestone_streven.milestone_id
WHERE streven.streven_id = 2 AND milestone.name IN ($v_subdoel)

--SELECT target_kerkrade, target_zuidlimburg FROM ervarengezondheid WHERE ervarengezondheid_id= 2
--SELECT DISTINCT target_kerkrade, target_zuidlimburg FROM ervarengezondheid, milestone 
--WHERE name IN ($v_subdoel) and ervarengezondheid_id= 2
SELECT DISTINCT target_kerkrade, target_zuidlimburg
FROM ervarengezondheid
JOIN milestone_ervarengezondheid ON ervarengezondheid.ervarengezondheid_id = milestone_ervarengezondheid.ervarengezondheid_id
JOIN milestone ON milestone.milestone_id = milestone_ervarengezondheid.milestone_id
WHERE ervarengezondheid.ervarengezondheid_id = 2 AND milestone.name IN ($v_subdoel);

--SELECT name FROM wijk, milestone 
--WHERE wijk_id= 1 and name IN ($v_wijken) and name IN ($v_subdoel)
--SELECT DISTINCT wijk.name FROM wijk, milestone 
--WHERE wijk_id= 1 and wijk.name IN ($v_wijken) and milestone.name IN ($v_subdoel)
SELECT DISTINCT wijk.name
FROM wijk
JOIN milestone_wijk ON wijk.wijk_id = milestone_wijk.wijk_id
JOIN milestone ON milestone.milestone_id = milestone_wijk.milestone_id
WHERE wijk.wijk_id = 1 AND wijk.name IN ($v_wijken) AND milestone.name IN ($v_subdoel);

--SELECT 'Programma:' AS label, title FROM programma 
--WHERE title IN ('Diverse programmas vitaal ouder worden', 'Geboorteflex', 'Knooppunt')
SELECT 'Programma:' AS label, programma.title
FROM programma
JOIN milestone_programma ON programma.programma_id = milestone_programma.programma_id
JOIN milestone ON milestone_programma.milestone_id = milestone.milestone_id
WHERE programma.title IN ('Diverse programmas vitaal ouder worden', 'Geboorteflex', 'Knooppunt') AND milestone.name IN ($v_subdoel);
SELECT name FROM milestone WHERE milestone_id=3 and name in ($v_subdoel) --and name in ($v_programmalijn)

--SELECT name FROM streven WHERE streven_id= 3
--SELECT DISTINCT streven.name FROM streven, milestone 
--WHERE milestone.name IN ($v_subdoel) and streven_id= 3
SELECT DISTINCT streven.name 
FROM streven
JOIN milestone_streven ON streven.streven_id = milestone_streven.streven_id
JOIN milestone ON milestone.milestone_id = milestone_streven.milestone_id
WHERE streven.streven_id = 3 AND milestone.name IN ($v_subdoel)

--SELECT DISTINCT target_kerkrade, target_zuidlimburg FROM ervarengezondheid, milestone 
--WHERE name IN ($v_subdoel) and ervarengezondheid_id= 3
SELECT DISTINCT target_kerkrade, target_zuidlimburg
FROM ervarengezondheid
JOIN milestone_ervarengezondheid ON ervarengezondheid.ervarengezondheid_id = milestone_ervarengezondheid.ervarengezondheid_id
JOIN milestone ON milestone.milestone_id = milestone_ervarengezondheid.milestone_id
WHERE ervarengezondheid.ervarengezondheid_id = 3 AND milestone.name IN ($v_subdoel);

--SELECT name FROM wijk WHERE wijk_id= 2 and name IN ($v_wijken)
--SELECT DISTINCT wijk.name FROM wijk, milestone 
--WHERE  wijk.name IN ($v_wijken) and milestone.name IN ($v_subdoel) and wijk_id= 2
SELECT DISTINCT wijk.name
FROM wijk
JOIN milestone_wijk ON wijk.wijk_id = milestone_wijk.wijk_id
JOIN milestone ON milestone.milestone_id = milestone_wijk.milestone_id
WHERE wijk.wijk_id = 2 AND wijk.name IN ($v_wijken) AND milestone.name IN ($v_subdoel);

--SELECT title FROM programma WHERE programma_id= 5 and title IN ($v_subdoel) 
--SELECT DISTINCT title
--FROM programma
--WHERE programma_id = 5 AND title IN ($v_subdoel);
--SELECT DISTINCT title
--FROM programma
--WHERE programma_id = 5
--  AND title IN (SELECT name FROM milestone WHERE name = $v_subdoel);
SELECT DISTINCT programma.title
FROM programma
JOIN milestone_programma ON programma.programma_id = milestone_programma.programma_id
JOIN milestone ON milestone_programma.milestone_id = milestone.milestone_id
WHERE programma.programma_id= 5 AND milestone.name IN ($v_subdoel);
SELECT name FROM milestone WHERE milestone_id=4 and name in ($v_subdoel)

--SELECT name FROM streven WHERE streven_id= 4
--SELECT DISTINCT streven.name FROM streven, milestone 
--WHERE milestone.name IN ($v_subdoel) and streven_id= 4
SELECT DISTINCT streven.name 
FROM streven
JOIN milestone_streven ON streven.streven_id = milestone_streven.streven_id
JOIN milestone ON milestone.milestone_id = milestone_streven.milestone_id
WHERE streven.streven_id = 4 AND milestone.name IN ($v_subdoel)

--SELECT target_kerkrade, target_zuidlimburg FROM ervarengezondheid WHERE ervarengezondheid_id= 4
--SELECT DISTINCT target_kerkrade, target_zuidlimburg FROM ervarengezondheid, milestone 
--WHERE milestone.name IN ($v_subdoel) and ervarengezondheid_id= 4
SELECT DISTINCT target_kerkrade, target_zuidlimburg
FROM ervarengezondheid
JOIN milestone_ervarengezondheid ON ervarengezondheid.ervarengezondheid_id = milestone_ervarengezondheid.ervarengezondheid_id
JOIN milestone ON milestone.milestone_id = milestone_ervarengezondheid.milestone_id
WHERE ervarengezondheid.ervarengezondheid_id = 4 AND milestone.name IN ($v_subdoel);

--SELECT DISTINCT wijk.name FROM wijk, milestone 
--WHERE wijk_id= 4 and wijk.name IN ($v_wijken) and milestone.name IN ($v_subdoel)
SELECT DISTINCT wijk.name
FROM wijk
JOIN milestone_wijk ON wijk.wijk_id = milestone_wijk.wijk_id
JOIN milestone ON milestone.milestone_id = milestone_wijk.milestone_id
WHERE wijk.wijk_id = 4 AND wijk.name IN ($v_wijken) AND milestone.name IN ($v_subdoel);

--SELECT title FROM programma WHERE programma_id= 6
SELECT DISTINCT programma.title
FROM programma
JOIN milestone_programma ON programma.programma_id = milestone_programma.programma_id
JOIN milestone ON milestone_programma.milestone_id = milestone.milestone_id
WHERE programma.programma_id= 6 AND milestone.name IN ($v_subdoel);

SELECT subdoel_name, aantal FROM keyprestatieindicator 
WHERE name= 'Budget' and range IN ($v_budgetrange)

--SELECT name, target 
--FROM kpi
--WHERE name= 'Budget' and target IN ($v_budget) --and name IN ($v_subdoelen)
SELECT subdoel_name, aantal FROM keyprestatieindicator 
WHERE name= 'Uitgaven' and range IN ($v_uitgavenrange)

--SELECT name, target 
--FROM kpi
--WHERE name= 'Kosten' and target IN ($v_kosten)
SELECT subdoel_name, aantal FROM keyprestatieindicator 
WHERE name= 'Kosten' and range IN ($v_kostenrange)

--SELECT kpi.name, kpi.target 
--FROM kpi 
--WHERE name= 'Uitgaven' and target IN ($v_uitgaven)
SELECT subdoel_name, aantal FROM keyprestatieindicator 
WHERE name= 'Deelnemers' and range IN ($v_deelnemersrange)

SELECT subdoel_name, aantal FROM keyprestatieindicator 
WHERE name= 'Gemiddelde kosten per deelnemer' and range IN ($v_gemkosperdeel)

list.definition:
SELECT milestone.name FROM milestone
JOIN project_milestone ON milestone.milestone_id = project_milestone.milestone_id
JOIN project ON project.project_id = project_milestone.project_id
WHERE project.title IN ($v_programmalijn)
list.label: subdoel
list.name: v_subdoel
list.query:
SELECT milestone.name FROM milestone
JOIN project_milestone ON milestone.milestone_id = project_milestone.milestone_id
JOIN project ON project.project_id = project_milestone.project_id
WHERE project.title IN ($v_programmalijn)

list.definition:
SELECT keyprestatieindicator.range
FROM keyprestatieindicator
JOIN milestone_keyprestatieindicator ON keyprestatieindicator.keyprestatieindicator_id = milestone_keyprestatieindicator.keyprestatieindicator_id
JOIN milestone ON milestone.milestone_id = milestone_keyprestatieindicator.milestone_id
WHERE milestone.name IN ($v_subdoel) 
AND keyprestatieindicator.name= 'Budget'
list.label: Budget
list.name: v_budgetrange

JOIN milestone ON milestone.milestone_id = milestone_keyprestatieindicator.milestone_id

AND keyprestatieindicator.name= 'Budget'
